description:
He is one of the two fallen angels that broke free from his imprisonment in hell and begins to cause the disappearance of the guardian angels on earth. He has a red hair. Zeus gave him the ability to heal with his lips, when he became a Saint Beast. He was the leader of the Six Saint Beast and was very close to Genbu no Shin.
Attribute: Light
Ability: Manipulating space
Attack: Cosmo Menace
Image Color: Bordeaux
name: Kirin no Judas
